ygData.subject: Perl implementation availability?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Is there a publicly available Perl version of NEAT (or any of the variants)?  If there s some existing code out there, I would probably just use that

Hello,

Is there a publicly available Perl version of NEAT (or any of the 
=
variants)?  If there's some existing code out there, I would probably 
just=
 use that but I'd really love to see a Perl NEAT module on CPAN 
and would =
be interested in contributing somehow to help that happen.  

I have an att=
empt at a Moose-based version but am only about 60-70% 
there working from =
the windows c++ version.  Moose might have too much 
overhead but I thought=
 it would be convenient and both easier to 
maintain and extend.  I'm still=
 something of a Moose noob but it seems 
like a good fit.

Thanks for any i=
nformation.

Ben
